titleStmt.title: The Lord Chief Justice Herbert's account examin'd by W.A., Barrister at Law, ... ; wherein it is shewn that those authorities in law, whereby he would excuse his judgment in Sir Edward Hales his case, are very unfairly cited and as ill applied.
titleStmt.author: Atwood, William, d. 1705?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Robinson ... and Mat. Wotton ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to W. Atwood. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
